basisSet.dc:title: cc-pCV6Z(old)
basisSet.dc:description:
Correlation Consistent Polarized Core/Valence Sextuple Zeta (cc-pCV6Z) Basis ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Elements Contraction References O : (21s,15p,9d,7f,5g,3h,1i) -> [12s,11p,9d,7f,5g,3h,1i] D. Feller (to be published)
These basis sets include extra tight (5s,5p,4d,3f,3g,1h) Gaussian primitives. The correlation consistent core-valence basis sets extend the ideas of the original cc-pVxZ sets by including extra functions designed for core-core and core-valence correlation.
cc-pCV6Z(old) Atomic Energies
State UHF (noneq) ROHF (noneq) ROHF(equiv) HF Limit (equiv) ----- ---------- ----------- ----------- --------- H 2-S -0.4999992 -0.4999992 -0.4999992 -0.50000
